name: nf-core-tools

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: nextflow
dependencies.description: Data-driven computational pipelines.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-filetype
dependencies.description:
Small and dependency free Python package to infer file type and MIME
type checking the magic numbers signature of a file or buffer.

dependencies.name: py-galaxy-tool-util
dependencies.description: The Galaxy tool utilities.

dependencies.name: py-gitpython
dependencies.description: GitPython is a python library used to interact with Git repositories.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-markdown
dependencies.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pre-commit
dependencies.description:
A framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit
hooks.

dependencies.name: py-prompt-toolkit
dependencies.description: Library for building powerful interactive command lines in Python

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-workflow
dependencies.description:
A workflow-system agnostic testing framework that aims to make
pipeline/workflow testing easy by using YAML files for the test
configuration.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-questionary
dependencies.description:
Questionary is a Python library for effortlessly building pretty command
line interfaces.

dependencies.name: py-refgenie
dependencies.description:
Refgenie manages storage, access, and transfer of reference genome
resources.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-requests-cache
dependencies.description:
A persistent HTTP cache that provides an easy way to get better
performance with the python requests library.

dependencies.name: py-rich-click
dependencies.description:
The intention of rich-click is to provide attractive help output from
click, formatted with rich, with minimal customisation required.

dependencies.name: py-rich
dependencies.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data
